mapper.select: SELECT c.id as commentId, c.vlog_id as vlogId, u.id as vlogerId, u.nickname as commentUserNickname, u.face as commentUserFace, c.father_comment_id as fatherCommentId, c.comment_user_id as commentUserId, c.content as content, c.like_counts as likeCounts, fu.nickname as replyedUserNickname, c.create_time as createTime FROM `comment` as c LEFT JOIN users as u ON c.comment_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `comment` as fc ON c.father_comment_id = fc.id LEFT JOIN users as fu ON fc.comment_user_id = fu.id WHERE c.vlog_id = #{paramMap.vlogId} ORDER BY c.like_counts DESC, c.create_time DESC
